thread.title: LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT
thread.title_full: LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT

title: LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 0:33 [IST] 
Mega Power Star Ram Charan 's Bruce Lee is all set to hit screens tomorrow and the euphoria around it is touching the sky as the count down for the first ever show dropped to hours. Bruce Lee - The Fighter (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
As reported earlier, censor talk is pretty much in favor of the film and the reports that are pouring in from the industry sources are also positive. 
Megastar Chiranjeevi's cameo, ensemble cast, rocking dances, super hit songs and Sreenu Vaitla's trade mark comedy have all been the crowd pulling factors and are keeping the mega fans on their toes for the release. 
Makers of the film also took the release quite prestigious and are not leaving any stone un-turned to offer a real feast for the movie buffs, this festive season. 
On that note, we have a spoiler for everyone out there, who are eager to get a scoop from the film and since the release is only few hours away, we don't mind sharing it with you all. 
Going by the leaked reports, that are making rounds online, here is the order of song placements from Bruce Lee including the song situations. LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT 1/6 Run 
Run Run song marks the first and introductory song of the hero, which goes with some inspiring lyrics and rocking dances. Ram Charan is playing Karthik in the film, who is a stunt master. LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT 2/6 Riya 
Riya Riya song comes second in the film, which leave a feeler about the romantic track between Rakul and Charan. Rakul is playing Riya in the film, who is a game designer. LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT 3/6 Mega Meter 
Mega Meter was placed just before the interval bang, which takes the mood to the next level. Surely pulls some noise from the masses. LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT 4/6 Le Chalo 
Le Chalo reportedly is the first song in the second half, which depicts the love between the lead pair. LEAKED! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Song Placements Are OUT 5/6 Bruce Lee 
The title song was the last song of the film, which is placed before the pre-climax. It is known that the dance in the song has been lauded by the King Khan himself. You might like
